titleStmt.title: A dialogue concerning witches and witchcraftes In which is laide open how craftely the Diuell deceiueth not onely the witches but many other and so leadeth them awrie into many great errours. By George Giffard minister of Gods word in Maldon.
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet for Tobie Cooke and Mihil Hart, and are to be sold [by Tobie Cooke] in Pauls Church-yard, at the Tygers head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the Tygers head
